page.title: 19EDUCATION IN ARBROATH.
page.content: {Education}in our area has been unusual in that 1985 has seen teachers going on strike because they felt they deserved more money for the job they did.In Scotland the dispute has been going on all year and our area has been badly affected.This has been because the teacher's union in Scotland decided to "target"the constituency of the local M.P.Many parents feel that this "targeting" has been unfair because children in targeted areas have missed weeks of schooling before exams.Next year could be the same.The local{media}has written about the dispute and public meetings have been held with the{ {politician}who represents the area attending.On a happier note the new High School is ready for use and the new sporting{facilities}are already in use.
